원문: 너희를 이대로 보내면 내가 공작한테 더러운 꼴을 당해서.
첫 번 째 후보군: if I let you go like this, I’ll be the one who gets in trouble with the duke.
두 번 째 후보군: If I let you go like this, I'll end up facing disgrace from the duke.

첫 번 째 후보군: should I cut off what’s between their legs?
두 번 째 후보군: Cut off what's between their legs?

첫 번 째 후보군: we won’t ever act recklessly again.
두 번 째 후보군: We won’t ever act recklessly again.

첫 번 째 후보군: we’re so glad you forgave us...
두 번 째 후보군: I'm so relieved that you forgave us...

첫 번 째 후보군: my lady, you should close your eyes.
두 번 째 후보군: My lady, it's best if you close your eyes.

원문: 자르진 말고, 한 대씩 세게 두들겨 줘.
첫 번 째 후보군: don’t cut it off, but give them a good whack.
두 번 째 후보군: Don't cut it off, but give them a good whack each.

첫 번 째 후보군: take a good look at my face.
두 번 째 후보군: Take a good look at my face.

원문: 의뢰를 수행할 때, 물지 말아야 할 상대가 누군지는 기억해야지.
첫 번 째 후보군: you should remember who not to bite when you’re carrying out a job.
두 번 째 후보군: You should remember who you must not bite when carrying out a request.
I think the lecture is over now.

첫 번 째 후보군: ...the place that was swallowed by darkness?
두 번 째 후보군: Is this a place swallowed by darkness?

첫 번 째 후보군: we can’t even recover the bodies...
두 번 째 후보군: We can't even retrieve the bodies...

첫 번 째 후보군: your highness, what will we do now?
두 번 째 후보군: your highness, what will you do now?

첫 번 째 후보군: we’ll use this place as our base...
두 번 째 후보군: We'll use this place as our base.

첫 번 째 후보군: ...and start exterminating the monsters in the forest.
두 번 째 후보군: ...and properly start exterminating the monsters in the forest.

원문: 피오나 영애는 아카데미의 연구원들과 있는 게 낫지 않을까.
첫 번 째 후보군: wouldn’t it be better for lady fiona to stay with the academy researchers?
두 번 째 후보군: Wouldn't it be better for Lady Fiona to stay with the academy researchers?

첫 번 째 후보군: they seem to have a lot of work to do.
두 번 째 후보군: There seems to be quite a lot of work.

첫 번 째 후보군: he doesn’t want to send me to a dangerous place, huh?
두 번 째 후보군: He doesn't want to send me to a dangerous place, does he?

첫 번 째 후보군: we should separate our personal and official duties.
두 번 째 후보군: We should distinguish between personal matters and official duties.

첫 번 째 후보군: this isn’t where I’m supposed to be.
두 번 째 후보군: This is not where I belong.

원문: 일단 황제 폐하께 칙령도 받은 몸이니 열심히 일하죠.
첫 번 째 후보군: let’s work hard since we’ve been given an imperial order.
두 번 째 후보군: Since I have received an imperial decree, I shall work hard.

첫 번 째 후보군: I’ll just go out for a bit at the start.
두 번 째 후보군: I'll just go out for a bit at the start.

원문: …아벨이 빨리 돌아와서 네 대타가 되어야 하는데.
첫 번 째 후보군: abel needs to come back soon so he can take your place.
두 번 째 후보군: Abel needs to come back soon so he can be your substitute.

첫 번 째 후보군: you just want to work your master to the bone.
두 번 째 후보군: You just want to work your master to the bone.

원문: 이런, 어딜 봐도 어린 시절처럼 다정하신데요.
첫 번 째 후보군: oh my, you’re as close as you were when you were young.
두 번 째 후보군: Oh my, no matter how you look at it, you're just as affectionate as you were in your childhood.

원문: 겉모습이야 두 분 다 콩나물처럼 쑥쑥 자라셨지만.
첫 번 째 후보군: you’ve both grown like bean sprouts, though.
두 번 째 후보군: You've both shot up like bean sprouts, though.

첫 번 째 후보군: yes, would you like to see?
두 번 째 후보군: Yes. Would you like to take a look?

첫 번 째 후보군: it’s my wife, who I left at home.
두 번 째 후보군: It’s my wife, who I left at home.

첫 번 째 후보군: I heard she was pregnant before I left.
두 번 째 후보군: I heard she was pregnant before I left.

첫 번 째 후보군: you should have told me sooner!
두 번 째 후보군: You should've told me that sooner!

원문: 제 옆이 아니라 부인 곁에 있어야 되잖아요?!
첫 번 째 후보군: you should be with your wife, not me!
두 번 째 후보군: You should be with your wife, not me!

첫 번 째 후보군: I can’t help it. it’s my duty.
두 번 째 후보군: It can't be helped. It's my duty.

원문: 그래도 주군께서 예정일 전에 돌아가게 해 준다고 하셨으니까요.
첫 번 째 후보군: but his highness said I could go back before the due date.
두 번 째 후보군: But my lord said I could return before the scheduled date.

원문: 아벨, 사람 부려 먹는 게 너무 독해!
첫 번 째 후보군: abel, you’re too ruthless in working people hard!
두 번 째 후보군: Abel, you're too ruthless in working people hard!

원문: 제가 더 빨리 헤일론으로 돌아갈 수 있도록 해줄게요.
첫 번 째 후보군: I’ll help you get back to heylon faster.
두 번 째 후보군: I'll help you return to Heylon faster.

첫 번 째 후보군: I know you have a reason to hurry,
두 번 째 후보군: Even if you have a reason to hurry,

원문: 숲에 번개를 난사하면 아군이 겁을 먹는단 말이다.
첫 번 째 후보군: but if you fire lightning all over the forest, you’ll scare our allies.
두 번 째 후보군: If you keep firing lightning all over the forest, you'll end up scaring our allies.

첫 번 째 후보군: but it helped us finish early.
두 번 째 후보군: But thanks to that, we finished early.

원문: 영애의 힘으로 이 죽은 땅을 복구시킬 수 있을 것 같나요?
첫 번 째 후보군: do you think you can restore this dead land with your power?
두 번 째 후보군: Do you think you can restore this dead land with your power, my lady?

첫 번 째 후보군: I think I can do some of it,
두 번 째 후보군: I think some of it might be possible,

원문: 이렇게 넓은 범위의 죽은 땅은 저도 처음이라…
첫 번 째 후보군: but I’ve never seen such a large area of dead land before...
두 번 째 후보군: But I've never encountered a dead land of this scale before...

첫 번 째 후보군: it’s because my power is lacking.
두 번 째 후보군: It's because my power is lacking.

원문: 성녀님은 한 분이고, 죽은 땅은 여러 개인데…
첫 번 째 후보군: there’s only one saint, but there are many dead lands...
두 번 째 후보군: There's only one saint, but many dead lands...

첫 번 째 후보군: it’s too much for you to handle alone.
두 번 째 후보군: It's impossible to handle this alone from the start.

원문: 맞아요, 유니스 영애가 부족한 게 아니에요
첫 번 째 후보군: that’s right, it’s not because you’re lacking.
두 번 째 후보군: That’s right, Lady Eunice, it’s not because you’re lacking.

첫 번 째 후보군: don’t rush and take your time.
두 번 째 후보군: Don't be impatient and take it step by step.

첫 번 째 후보군: yes, we’ll help you with anything.
두 번 째 후보군: Yes, we’ll help too, with anything.

원문: 어려운 부분이 있으면 혼자 앓지 말아요, 영애.
첫 번 째 후보군: if you’re having a hard time, don’t suffer alone, my lady.
두 번 째 후보군: If you're struggling, don't suffer alone, my lady.
Everyone is cheering me on like this,

원문: 혼자 약한 소리를 할 수는 없어.
첫 번 째 후보군: so I can’t be the only one feeling weak.
두 번 째 후보군: I can't show weakness on my own.

원문: 이러다가 너무 금방 끝내버리는 건 아닌지 몰라.
첫 번 째 후보군: we might finish this too quickly.
두 번 째 후보군: We might end up finishing this too quickly.
